subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|來|夊|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|t2=foot; to walk slowly}}. {{zh-l|*來}} was the original character for “wheat”. Several possible interpretations:
* This character originally meant “to come”. Because the simpler {{zh-l|*來}} was commonly used for this (borrowed) sense, its original meaning (“wheat”) switched with {{zh-l|*麥}}.
* {{zh-l|*夊}} represents the ancient concept that wheat came from the heavens.
* {{zh-l|*夊}} represents growth of the wheat plant.
